column4: Description
column5: Pre-conditions
column6: Test Steps
column7: Expected Results

column4: Validate API accepts document uploads in supported formats
column5: API Gateway deployed; S3 bucket configured
column6: 1. Prepare test documents (PDF/JPEG/PNG/TIFF); 2. Call upload API with valid auth token; 3. Verify response with job ID; 4. Confirm document stored in S3
column7: HTTP 200 with valid job ID returned; document stored with encryption

column4: Validate processing status tracking throughout workflow
column5: Document uploaded and processing; Step Functions running
column6: 1. Submit document for processing; 2. Poll status API during processing; 3. Verify status transitions; 4. Confirm final status
column7: Status updates from submitted to processing to completed

column4: Validate Amazon Textract text extraction accuracy
column5: Textract integration configured; Test documents prepared
column6: 1. Upload high-quality PDF document; 2. Trigger Textract analysis; 3. Compare extracted text to ground truth; 4. Calculate accuracy percentage
column7: Text extraction accuracy >95% on test documents

column4: Validate Textract forms and key-value extraction
column5: Textract FORMS feature enabled; Form documents prepared
column6: 1. Upload form document (invoice/application); 2. Trigger Textract with FORMS feature; 3. Verify key-value pairs extracted; 4. Compare to expected values
column7: Key-value pairs extracted with >90% accuracy

column4: Validate Textract table extraction from documents
column5: Textract TABLES feature enabled; Table documents prepared
column6: 1. Upload document with tables; 2. Trigger Textract with TABLES feature; 3. Verify table structure extracted; 4. Compare to expected structure
column7: Table structure and cell values extracted correctly

column4: Validate Comprehend entity extraction from documents
column5: Comprehend integration configured; Ground truth dataset prepared
column6: 1. Process test documents through Comprehend; 2. Extract named entities; 3. Compare to ground truth labels; 4. Calculate precision/recall
column7: Entity extraction F1 score >85%

column4: Validate Comprehend PII detection and redaction
column5: Comprehend PII detection enabled; Test documents with known PII
column6: 1. Process documents with PII; 2. Verify PII entities detected; 3. Confirm redaction applied; 4. Validate audit logging
column7: All PII detected and redacted with >95% accuracy

column4: Validate complete document processing pipeline
column5: All services deployed and configured; Test documents prepared
column6: 1. Upload document via API; 2. Monitor Step Functions execution; 3. Retrieve processing results; 4. Validate extracted data accuracy
column7: Document processed through all stages with correct results

column4: Validate low-confidence documents routed for human review
column5: A2I workflow configured; Confidence threshold set to 85%
column6: 1. Submit documents with varying quality; 2. Verify high-confidence auto-processed; 3. Confirm low-confidence queued for A2I; 4. Test review workflow
column7: Documents below 85% confidence routed to human review

column4: Validate human review results integrated back to pipeline
column5: A2I task created; Human reviewer available
column6: 1. Complete human review task; 2. Verify corrected data captured; 3. Confirm results stored; 4. Validate notification sent
column7: Human review corrections applied and stored correctly

column4: Validate document metadata persistence and retrieval
column5: DynamoDB tables configured; Lambda functions deployed
column6: 1. Process multiple documents; 2. Query DynamoDB for metadata; 3. Verify data consistency; 4. Test pagination and filtering
column7: Metadata stored and retrievable with correct values

column4: Validate extracted data delivery to downstream systems
column5: Downstream API endpoint available; Integration configured
column6: 1. Process document to completion; 2. Verify API call to downstream system; 3. Confirm data format; 4. Check error handling
column7: Downstream system receives correctly formatted data

column4: Validate field-level extraction accuracy for invoices
column5: Ground truth dataset with field labels; Invoice documents prepared
column6: 1. Process test invoices; 2. Compare extracted fields to ground truth; 3. Calculate field-level accuracy; 4. Identify extraction gaps
column7: >95% accuracy on key fields (amount/date/vendor/invoice number)

column4: Validate field-level extraction for purchase orders
column5: Ground truth dataset; PO documents prepared
column6: 1. Process test POs; 2. Compare extracted fields; 3. Calculate accuracy; 4. Document gaps
column7: >95% accuracy on key fields (PO number/date/line items)

column4: Description
column5: Pre-conditions
column6: Test Steps
column7: Expected Results

column4: Validate system handles expected document volume
column5: Load testing environment configured; 100 test documents prepared
column6: 1. Submit 100 documents over 1 hour; 2. Monitor processing times; 3. Measure throughput rate; 4. Verify no errors
column7: Process 100+ documents/hour with <30s average processing time

column4: Validate API latency meets SLA requirements
column5: API Gateway and Lambda deployed; Load testing tools configured
column6: 1. Execute load test with 50 concurrent users; 2. Measure API response times; 3. Calculate p95 latency; 4. Analyze error rates
column7: 95% of requests complete within 2 seconds

column4: Validate Lambda auto-scaling under load
column5: Auto-scaling configured; CloudWatch alarms set up
column6: 1. Generate spike in document submissions; 2. Monitor Lambda concurrency; 3. Verify graceful handling; 4. Check for throttling
column7: System scales to handle load without degradation

column4: Validate handling of documents near size limits
column5: Test documents 20-25MB prepared
column6: 1. Upload large documents (20-25MB); 2. Monitor processing duration; 3. Verify successful completion; 4. Check memory utilization
column7: Large documents processed within extended SLA (60 seconds)

column4: Validate 99.5% uptime requirement over test period
column5: Monitoring tools active; Synthetic monitoring configured
column6: 1. Run system for extended test period; 2. Monitor CloudWatch metrics; 3. Calculate availability percentage; 4. Review any incidents
column7: System maintains 99.5% availability

column4: Validate system recovers from transient errors
column5: Error injection capability; DLQ configured
column6: 1. Inject transient errors; 2. Verify retry mechanism; 3. Confirm DLQ captures persistent failures; 4. Test reprocessing
column7: Transient errors recovered; persistent errors logged to DLQ

column4: Validate Cognito JWT authentication on all endpoints
column5: Cognito User Pool configured; Test users created
column6: 1. Attempt API access without token; 2. Attempt with invalid token; 3. Attempt with expired token; 4. Test valid token access
column7: Unauthorized requests rejected; valid tokens grant access

column4: Validate S3 and DynamoDB encryption configuration
column5: KMS keys created; Encryption enabled on resources
column6: 1. Verify S3 bucket encryption settings; 2. Check DynamoDB encryption; 3. Validate KMS key usage; 4. Test data retrieval with encryption
column7: All data encrypted with customer-managed KMS keys

column4: Validate TLS encryption on all communications
column5: TLS certificates configured; Security groups properly set
column6: 1. Monitor API traffic; 2. Verify TLS 1.2+ usage; 3. Check VPC endpoint encryption; 4. Validate certificate validity
column7: All traffic encrypted with TLS 1.2+

column4: Validate IAM roles follow least privilege principle
column5: IAM roles created per service; Policy documents reviewed
column6: 1. Review Lambda execution role permissions; 2. Verify Textract service role scope; 3. Check service role policies; 4. Test privilege boundaries
column7: Roles have minimum required permissions only

column4: Validate Lambda runs in private subnets with VPC endpoints
column5: VPC configured; Private subnets and endpoints created
column6: 1. Verify Lambda VPC configuration; 2. Test VPC endpoint connectivity; 3. Confirm no public internet access; 4. Validate security group rules
column7: Lambda isolated in VPC with controlled egress

column4: Validate CloudTrail and CloudWatch logging
column5: CloudTrail enabled; CloudWatch Logs configured
column6: 1. Perform API operations; 2. Verify CloudTrail events logged; 3. Check CloudWatch Logs entries; 4. Validate log retention
column7: All operations logged with required retention

column4: Validate extraction accuracy tracking and alerting
column5: CloudWatch metrics configured; Baseline accuracy established
column6: 1. Process batch of validation documents; 2. Calculate accuracy metrics; 3. Verify metrics published; 4. Test alert thresholds
column7: Accuracy metrics tracked; alerts trigger below threshold

column4: Validate confidence scores correlate with actual accuracy
column5: Test documents with ground truth; Confidence analysis tools
column6: 1. Process documents and record confidence scores; 2. Bin by confidence range; 3. Calculate actual accuracy per bin; 4. Assess calibration
column7: High confidence predictions (>0.9) are >98% accurate

column7: PO key fields extracted accurately

column7: Human review efficient and corrections accurate

column7: Users can easily upload and track document processing

column7: Users can efficiently review and approve extracted data

column4: Validate programmatic access meets developer requirements
column5: API documentation available; Test credentials provided
column6: 1. Authenticate via API; 2. Submit document; 3. Poll for results; 4. Retrieve extracted data
column7: API provides complete programmatic access

column4: Validate production infrastructure is correctly configured
column5: Production deployment complete; All services running
column6: 1. Verify all AWS resources created; 2. Check service health endpoints; 3. Validate monitoring/alerting; 4. Test connectivity
column7: Production environment fully operational

column4: Validate operational runbooks are accurate and complete
column5: Runbooks documented; Operations team available
column6: 1. Walk through each runbook procedure; 2. Execute sample operations; 3. Verify steps are accurate; 4. Identify gaps

column4: Validate CloudWatch dashboards provide operational visibility
column5: Dashboards configured; Sample data available
column6: 1. Review all dashboard panels; 2. Verify metrics populate; 3. Test drill-down capabilities; 4. Validate alert thresholds
column7: Dashboards provide complete operational visibility

column4: Validate backup procedures work correctly

column7: Backups complete successfully and are restorable

column4: Validate all security controls are in place
column5: Security implementation complete; Compliance checklist available
column6: 1. Review IAM policies; 2. Verify encryption; 3. Check audit logging; 4. Validate network security
column7: All security requirements satisfied

column4: Validate all users trained on system
column5: Training materials ready; User groups identified
column6: 1. Conduct training sessions; 2. Verify attendance; 3. Assess comprehension; 4. Document completion
column7: All user groups trained and competent
